Hunter Expedition Mitts and Staff (for Female)
kDesc
In this case, the carrot is also the stick. Awarded for reaching a new Yetis Vs Hunters milestone. [#Legal]
Dans ce cas, la carotte est aussi le bâton. Félicitations, vous avez franchi une nouvelle étape de Yetis Vs Hunters. [#Legal]
Warme Finger und ein Wanderstab als Belohnung für das Erreichen eines neuen Meilensteins bei "Yetis gegen Jäger". [#Legal]
In questo caso, il bastone e la carota sono la stessa cosa. Premio ottenuto per aver raggiunto un nuovo traguardo in Yeti contro Cacciatori. [#Legal]
En este caso, la zanahoria es también el bastón. Se concede al conseguir un nuevo objetivo en Yetis contra cazadores. [#Legal]
*Not Localised* Female01_Hands_Yeti_Hunter [#Legal]
이런 경우에는, 당근과 채찍이 같네요. 설인 Vs 사냥꾼의 새로운 업적 달성의 보상으로 주어집니다.[#Legal]
In this case, the carrot is also the stick. Awarded for reaching a new Yetis Vs Hunters milestone. [#Legal]
現在的情況是，有獎賞也有懲罰。這是達到雪人VS獵人里程碑時所獲得的獎品道具。[#Legal]
現在的情況是，有獎賞也有懲罰。這是達到雪人VS獵人里程碑時所獲得的獎品道具。[#Legal]
In this case, the carrot is also the stick. Awarded for reaching a new Yetis Vs Hunters milestone. [#Legal]
